faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and processes.

items.question: How does your consultation process work?
items.answer: Our consultation process begins with a detailed initial meeting to understand your vision, requirements, and budget. We then conduct a site analysis, develop initial concepts, and work with you to refine the design. The process typically includes preliminary design, design planning, execution planning, and construction supervision.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Project duration varies depending on scope and complexity. Residential projects typically take 8-15 months from initial consultation to completion. Commercial projects can take 15-30 months. We create detailed schedules during the initial consultation phase.

items.question: Do you handle permits and regulatory approvals?
items.answer: Yes, we handle the entire approval process including building permits, heritage protection requirements, and regulatory coordination. Our team has extensive experience dealing with local building regulations and requirements for smooth project approval.

items.question: Can you work with my existing construction company?
items.answer: Absolutely! We're happy to work with qualified construction companies and can cooperate with your preferred building team. We also maintain relationships with trusted partner companies and can make recommendations if needed.
